column4: Ok so I originally asked about a bunch of stuff regarding memory and performance... havin suffered really slow and unresponsiveness of my system even at a real mem use of only 60%. I have solved the problem with the help on thins chat. vm.swappiness = 10
the system is now at 80% mem and still responsive
you can even set it to 0 if you sure your physical RAM is enough for all your need... swap will only be used for hibernate
